data.text: Di madagoaa deelaa, gei ana dama agoago ga mmaanege adu gi Jesus, ga heeu, “Ma koai dela e kaedahi e aamua i Teenua King o God di Langi?”18.1 Luke 22.24
Jesus ne gahi mai tamagiigi dulii ga haga duu i mua digaula,
ga helekai, “Au e hagi adu di tonu bolo maa goodou hagalee huli gii hai be nia dama lligi, goodou e deemee di ulu i Teenua King o God di Langi.18.3 Mark 10.15; Luke 18.17
Tangada dela e kaedahi e aamua i Teenua King o God di Langi la go tangada dela e dugu eia gi lala gii hai be tama deenei.”
Gei tangada dela ga benebene di tama dulii beenei i dogu ingoo, geia ne benebene hua Au.

“Tangada dela ma ga hagahuaidu tama e dahi dela e hagadonu Au i nia dama lligi beenei, gii doo a mee gi lodo di huaidu, e humalia hua e lawalawa dono uwa ginai di hadu damanaiee ga haga abulu gi lodo di moana.

E huaidu ang gi henuailala, idimaa nia mee aanei e hai nia daangada gii kili gi daha nadau hagadonu! Nia mee aanei ala koia e hai, gei e huaidu huoloo ang gi tangada dela e hai nia mee aanei gii kila.

“Maa doo lima, be go doo wae, e hai goe gii doo gi lodo di huaidu, duudia gi daha. Ma koia e humalia adu gi di goe di ulu gi lodo di mouli dee odi mo doo lima be doo wae hua e dahi, koia e humalia i di goe ma gaa hudu gi lodo di ahi dee odi mo oo lima mo oo wae dogomaalia.18.8 Matthew 5.30

“Maa do golomada e hai goe gi huaidu, kabee ina gi daha. Ma koia e humalia adu gi di goe di ulu i di mouli dee odi mo do golomada hua e dahi, i do benebene o golomada e lua gaa hudu gi lodo di ahi dee odi.18.9 Matthew 5.29
“Goodou hudee haga balumee ina tangada e dahi i digau ala e lligi beenei, gei gi iloo bolo nadau gau di langi e noho i baahi dogu Damana dela i di langi.
[Idimaa, Tama Tangada ne hanimoi belee haga mouli digau ala guu nngala.]18.11 Luke 19.10

“Goodou e hagamaanadu bolo aha: Taane ana siibi e lau, gei e dahi gaa ngala, mee gaa hai dana aha? Mee gaa dugu nia siibi e matiwa maa hiwa gi miami i hongo di gonduu, gaa hana ga halahala dana siibi dela ne ngala.
Au e hagi adu gi goodou di tonu bolo di madagoaa a mee ga gidee ia di maa, dono tene gi siibi deenei la koia e damana i dono tene ang gi nia siibi e matiwa maa hiwa ala digi nngala.
E hai gadoo be di godou Damana i di langi e de hiihai gi tangada e dahi i digau ala e lligi gii ngala.

“Maa do duaahina guu hai dana mee huaidu adu gi di goe, hana gi baahi o mee, hagi anga ina dana mee huaidu dela ne hai, malaa heia mada goolua. Maa mee guu donu adu gi di goe, goe ne haga heaga a mee.18.15 Luke 17.3

Maa mee hagalee hagalongo adu gi di goe, lahia dau dangada e dahi be dogolua madalia goe, gii hai be nia helekai di Beebaa Dabu e hai boloo: ‘Nia daangada dogolua be dogodolu e hai ai nia haga modongoohia nia mee huogodoo.’18.16 Deuteronomy 19.15
Maa mee hagalee hagalongo gi digaula, hagi anga ina gi di nohongo dabu. Maa mee hagalee hagalongo gi di nohongo dabu, dugu ina hua a mee be tangada tuadimee be tangada hagabudu dagitedi.

“Au e hagi adu gi goodou bolo godou mee huogodoo ala ma gaa tai i henuailala le e tai labelaa i di langi, godou mee huogodoo ala ma gaa huge i henuailala, le e huge labelaa i di langi.18.18 Matthew 16.19; John 20.23
“Gei Au e hagi adu labelaa gi goodou bolo maa dogolua gaa buni i dahi mee i di nau dalodalo i henuailala, gei dogu Damana i di langi e dugu anga di nau mee dela e tangi ai.
Idimaa, di madagoaa dela e buni ai nia daangada dogolua be dogodolu i dogu ingoo, gei Au e madalia ginaadou.”
Peter ga menege mai gi baahi o Jesus ga heeu, “Meenei Tagi, nia holongo e hia e dumaalia iei au gi dogu duaahina ma ga hai hala mai gi di au? Nia holongo e hidu?”18.21 Luke 17.3-4
Gei Jesus ga helekai, “Deeai, nia holongo e hidu e haga lagolago gi di madahidu.18.22 Genesis 4.24
Idimaa, Teenua King o God di Langi le e hai gadoo be di king dela ne maanadu bolo ia ga haga dina nia boibana ana gau hai hegau.
Mee ga daamada dana hagadina deenei, gei tangada e dahi ga dagi mai gi ono mua, tangada deenei e boibana gi mee nia pauna bahihadu silber e guli (1,000,000).

Tangada deenei ana bahihadu ai e dohu di hui dono boibana, gei di king ga helekai bolo mee e hui be di hege gi daha mo dono lodo mo ana dama, mo ana mee huogodoo ala e hai mee ginai, e hui ai dono boibana.
Tangada hai hegau deelaa ga dogoduli gi mua o mee, ga helekai, ‘Meenei, goe manawa dumaalia mai gi di au, au gaa hui laa dogu boibana.’
Di king deelaa la gu aloho, gu dumaalia gi mee i dono boibana, ga hagau a mee gii hana.
Gei taane deelaa ga hagatanga, gaa hana ga heetugi gi dono ehoo hai hegau dela ne boibana gi mee ana bahihadu silber e lau, gei mee gaa kumi a mee gaa llomi dono akii, ga helekai, ‘Huia do boibana!’
Di hoo hai hegau o maa ga dogoduli gi mua o mee ga dangidangi gi mee, ‘Meenei, goe manawa dumaalia mai gi di au, au gaa hui laa dogu boibana adu gi di goe.’
Gei mee digi hagalongo, gaa lahi a mee, gaa hudu gi lodo di hale galabudi, ga galabudi gaa dae loo gi di madagoaa a mee ma gaa hui dono boibana.
Gei nia hoo hai hegau o maa ala i golo gaa mmada gi di mee dela ne hai, gu lodo huaidu huoloo, gaa hula, ga hagi anga gi di king nia mee huogodoo ala ne hai.
Gei di king ga gahi mai tangada hai hegau deelaa, ga helekai gi mee, ‘Goe tangada hai hegau huaidu, idimaa, au gu dumaalia adu gi di goe do boibana hagatau, i doo dangi mai gi di au.
Gei goe ne aha dela digi dumaalia gi do ehoo hai hegau, be au dela ne dumaalia adu gi di goe?’
Di king deelaa gu hagawelewele huoloo, gaa hudu a mee gi lodo di hale galabudi, e hagaduadua gaa dae loo gi di madagoaa a mee ma gaa hui dono boibana hagatau.”
Gei Jesus ga helekai, “Dela gadoo di hai o dogu Damana i di langi gaa hai adu gi goodou, tangada nei mo tangada nei, maa goodou ga hagalee dumaalia ang gi godou duaahina aga i lodo godou manawa.”
